hp_raw: 135 ( fast healing  10,  negative healing , plagued coffin restoration)
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Nosferatu Malefactor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1357)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Twisted by age and eternal hunger, nosferatu malefactors spread plague in their wake and yearn for mortal blood.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Vampire_NosferatuMalefactor.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Nosferatu Malefactor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1357)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Vampire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=242" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 284</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 60 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +7

**Con** +3

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 135
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 10, [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), plagued coffin restoration)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) wood)

**Nosferatu Vulnerabilities** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +23 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d12+11 piercing plus Drink Blood

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 piercing plus plague of ancients

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 29
- **5th**
[Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=332) (×3)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) DC 29

**Command Thrall** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 

**Dominate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) DC 29

**Drink Blood** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Drinking Blood, the nosferatu malefactor regains 13 HP.

**Plague of Ancients**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162)) DC 29

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-273" />
name: Nosferatu Malefactor
